fulltext:
CHIEM DUC CHI
iOS Developer 
ABOUT ME
- About 3 years of experience in iOS 
development 
- Have basic knowledge in backend REST api 
with Django and Python (I wrote the api for my 
own app) 
- Fluent in English
SKILLS
SWIFT  
OBJECTIVE-C 
GIT 
AUTO LAYOUT 
CORE DATA
PHOTOSHOP  
XCODE 
OOP 
RESTFUL API 
HTML & CSS 
EXPERIENCE
WANNA INC
iOS developer, Dec 2017 - now
- In charged of all iOS projects of the company 
- Involved in architecture, design patterns, 
coding best practices for all iOS projects
CONSTRUCT DIGITAL
iOS Intern, Aug 2016 - Dec 2017 
- Focused on learning about iOS development by 
making demos, improve through code reviews.  
- In charged of maintaining iOS e-commerce 
brand app that's available in multiple SEA 
countries (Tupperware). 
- Supported to develop an enterprise app for 
teaching purpose for a Japanese company. 
EDUCATION & TRAINING
UNIVERSITY OF SOCIAL SCIENCES & 
HUMANITIES
Bachelor of Arts in Australian Studies
2011-2015 
STANDFORD IOS SWIFT ONLINE COURSE
HARVARD EDX: INTRODUCTION TO CS
LANGUAGES 
ENGLISH Fluent
Toeic 890/990 
PROJECTS 
TASTESHARE
Wanna Inc
This is a cooking guidance app for 
encouraging people to cook. 
My responsibilities: 
- Analyzed requirements with the team. 
- Researched for the most suitable 
architecture. 
- Developed the app from scratch, with 
best practices in mind. 
- Testing and fix bugs. 
- Implemented the changes/new features 
required by the manager. 
- Submitted to Appstore. 
Techs involved: Cocoapods, 
Google/Facebook logins, Swift, Rest API, 
Youtube Video Player, Autolayout. 
OHAYO CHECKER
Lion
This is an app to check for the emotions of 
children through their voice, from the 
emotion data we can tell if something is 
wrong with the children. 
My responsibilities: 
- Analyzed requirements. 
- Developed the app from scratch. 
- Testing and fix bugs. 
- Implemented the changes/new features 
required by the manager. 
Techs involved: Cocoapods, Audio Record, 
Swift, Rest API, Autolayout. 
NOVER: TRUYEN FULL - CONVERT
Personal project
This is a novel reader app with multiple 
sources for readers to choose. 
* The highest rank was 9th on Books 
Category of Vietnam Appstore. 
My responsibilities: 
- Brainstormed the requirements 
- Divided the requirements into phases base 
on priority. 
- Developed the iOS app with Swift 
- Built the backend API with Python, Django 
and Postgresql. 
- Submitted to Appstore. 
Techs involved: Amazon Web Services, 
Core Data, Auto layout, web crawling, 
Postgresql, REST API, Django,...
TUPPERWARE SINGAPORE
Tupperware Brands
This is an e-commerce app for people to 
view the products, get promos,... 
My responsibilities: 
- Worked on out-dated code base. 
- Improved the app performance. 
- Reduced number of crash points from 4 to 
zero. 
- Fixed numerous of layout issues. 
Techs involved: 3rd party library, image 
caching, REST API, Objective-C, debugging.

experiences.detail:
- In charged of all iOS projects of the company
- Involved in architecture, design patterns, coding best practices for all iOS projects

- Focused on learning about iOS development by making demos, improve through code reviews.
- In charged of maintaining iOS e-commerce brand app that's available in multiple SEA countries (Tupperware). - Supported to develop an enterprise app for teaching purpose for a Japanese company.
